ratings.question_text: Overall, how would you rate the workload of this course in comparison to other Yale courses you have taken:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
What is your overall rating of the primary instructor?
The primary instructor's sensitivity to students and ability to provide students with adequate feedback was:

narratives.question_text: Indicate the total number of hours per week (outside the classroom) you spent on this course:
Looking back on this course, what is your overall assessment of the course:  What are its strengths and weaknesses, and in what ways might it be improved?
comments: Excellent course for grant writing. Dr. Ma is very knowledgeable and could provide great insights. It is highly recommendable for students that will be applying for a grant or those who have at least a future project they want to write about.
excellent course which is very helpful to anyone applying for a grant

narratives.question_text: Please evaluate the instructor of this course. What are the instructor's strengths and weaknesses, and in what ways might his or her teaching be improved?
comments: Instructor: Xiaomei Ma  Dr. Ma uses this course to share her invaluable experience in grant writing and reviewing, and does so in a clear, methodical way. She has developed the course to provide students with hands-on opportunities to build their skills, and goes to great effort to review students' projects and provide critical feedback. She is helpful, responsive, and sensitive to the varied backgrounds that students bring to the course. I have never seen a professor put so much work (and heart!) into a class before, and am so thankful for the time she has shared with us!
Instructor: Xiaomei Ma  Excellent lecturer, very knowledgeable and highly experienced professor.
Instructor: Xiaomei Ma  Prof. Ma is wonderful! She is exceptionally knowledgeable and professional, and she cares a lot about her students. I've really enjoyed learning from her this semester.

Instructor: Xiaomei Ma  She is amazing, with an ability to teach each student at their own level. she made the class very enjoyable as her passion to see her students succeed is very evident in her teaching.

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize this course for a fellow student? Would you recommend it to another student? Why or why not?
comments: This is an extremely valuable course for anyone who wishes to pursue research at the graduate level or beyond, as it helps students develop critical grant writing skills.
Excellence course for grant writing for those who have a project in mind or are applying for a grant.

Highly recommended. This is a terrific course! The lectures and feedback from Prof. Ma are incredibly helpful for learning how to write a research proposal. This course is most valuable if you are in the early stages of developing a grant, and you've already decided on your specific aims.
